title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.1 - Family Court attorneys for children plan established
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.1 - Family Court attorneys for children plan established

State Regulations

There is hereby established in the
counties of the Second Judicial Department a plan for the operation of the

Family Court attorneys for children panels designated pursuant to section
243
(c) of the Family Court

Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
679.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
